Können fliegen.
{T}: Erhöhe Deinen Manavorrat um ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe. Spiele diese Fähigkeit wie einen Unterbrechungs-zauber.

mainBoard.name: Birds of Paradise
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
ocT: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. This ability is played as an interrupt.
mainBoard.text:
Flying
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

mainBoard.flavorText: "'War is no picnic,' my father liked to say. But the Ants seemed to disagree." —*General Chanek Valteroth*
mainBoard.name: Carrion Ants
mainBoard.text: {1}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

foreignData.name: Wolpertinger
foreignData.text:
Kann fliegen.
Vernichte am Ende eines Kampfes alle Kreaturen, die einen Wolpertinger geblockt haben oder von ihm geblockt wurden.

mainBoard.name: Cockatrice
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Any non-wall creature blocking Cockatrice is destroyed, as is any creature blocked by Cockatrice. Creatures destroyed in this way deal their damage before dying.

rulings.text: The ability destroys the creature at the end of the combat, which is after all first strike and normal damage dealing is done. This means that a creature may have to regenerate twice to survive the combat, once from damage and once again at end of combat.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

foreignData.name: Verfluchtes Land
foreignData.text: Während der Versorgungsphase des Beherrschers des verzauberten Landes fügt ihm das Verfluchte Land 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

mainBoard.name: Cursed Land
mainBoard.originalText: Cursed Land does 1 damage to target land's controller during his or her upkeep.
mainBoard.text:
Enchant land
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted land's controller, this Aura deals 1 damage to that player.

mainBoard.flavorText: An early inspiration for Urza, Tocasia's Onulets contained magical essences that could be cannibalized after they stopped functioning.
mainBoard.name: Onulet
mainBoard.originalText: If Onulet goes to the graveyard, its controller gains 2 life.
mainBoard.text: When this creature dies, you gain 2 life.

foreignData.name: Lähmung
foreignData.text: Die verzauberte Kreatur kann nicht während der Entap-Phase normal enttappt werden. Der Beherrscher der Kreatur muß in der Versorgungsphase 4 bezahlen, um sie zu enttappen. Tappe die Kreatur, wenn die Lähmung auf sie gesprochen wird.

mainBoard.name: Paralyze
mainBoard.originalText: Target creature is not untapped as normal during untap phase. Creature's controller may spend {4} during his or her upkeep to untap it. Tap target creature when Paralyze is cast.

rulings.text: Paralyze can be cast targeting a creature which is already tapped.
The creature can only be untapped using Paralyze once per turn.
Two Paralyzes are not cumulative. Paying either one will untap the creature.
This is a change from the most recent wording. As was the case in the past, Paralyze itself has the last triggered ability, rather than granting that ability to the enchanted creature.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature
When this Aura enters, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may pay {4}. If the player does, untap the creature.

foreignData.name: Der Schwarze Tod
foreignData.text:
Sollten am Ende eines Spielzuges keine Kreaturen mehr im Spiel sein, geht der schwarze Tod auf den Fiedhof.
{B}: Der schwarze Tod verursacht 1 Schadenspunkt bei allen Kreaturen und allen Spielern.

mainBoard.name: Pestilence
mainBoard.originalText:
{B} Do 1 damage to each creature and to both players.
If there are no creatures in play at the end of any turn, Pestilence must be discarded.

rulings.text: Each activation is considered a new damage effect. An activation can only be 1 point of damage.

It will stay on the battlefield if there is a creature that is put into the graveyard during the end step. This is because this ability will not trigger at all if there is at least one creature on the battlefield as the end step begins.
Note that "until end of turn" effects wear off after "at the beginning of the end step" triggered abilities, so an artifact that animates until end of turn can keep this on the battlefield.

mainBoard.text:
At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice this enchantment.
{B}: This enchantment deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

foreignData.name: Lebensquelle
foreignData.text: Du oder ein anderer Spieler Deiner Wahl erhält X Lebenspunkte dazu.

mainBoard.name: Whirling Dervish
mainBoard.originalText:
Protection from black
Gains +1/+1 (use counters) at the end of each turn in which it does damage to opponent.

rulings.text: If Dunerider Outlaw dealt damage to an opponent who later left the game before that turn's end step, its ability still gives it a +1/+1 counter.

Whirling Dervish's triggered ability checks to see if it dealt damage during the turn to an opponent of its current controller. If it dealt damage to player A, then player A takes control of it, the ability doesn't trigger.
Whirling Dervish's triggered ability gives it at most one +1/+1 counter each turn, regardless of how many opponents were dealt damage beyond the first.

mainBoard.text:
Protection from black
At the beginning of each end step, if this creature dealt damage to an opponent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

foreignData.name: Todesgriff
foreignData.text: {B}{B}: Neutralisiere einen grünen Spruch. Spiele diese Eigenschaft wie einen Unterbrechungszauber.

sideBoard.name: Deathgrip
sideBoard.originalText: {B}{B} Counter a green spell as it is being cast. This ability is played as an interrupt and does not affect green cards already in play.

foreignData.name: Lebenskraft
foreignData.text: {G}{G}: Neutralisiere einen schwarzen Spruch. Spiele diese Eigenschaft wie einen Unterbrechungszauber.

sideBoard.name: Lifeforce
sideBoard.originalText: {G}{G}: Counter a black spell as it is being cast. This use is played as an interrupt and does not affect black cards already in play.
